basics.name: Xinyi Wang
basics.label: Exploring the fusion of artificial intelligence and remote sensing in terrestrial ecosystem carbon cycling.

education.institution: IGSNRR, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences
education.area: supervised by Prof. Fenzhen Su and Assoc Prof. Fengqin Yan
supervised by Assoc Prof. Xinjia Zhang
courses: Remote sensing for Monitoring Land Use Change

projects.name: Inversion of Key Process Parameters in Regional Ecosystems
projects.summary: Develop high-resolution ecological remote sensing inversion models and reliable carbon flux datasets.

projects.name: Optimization and Regulation of Sea-Land Scenarios in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area under High-Intensity Perturbations
projects.summary: Analyze natural and human attribute factors affecting the ecological security of the Greater Bay Area, and establish spatial scenario optimization models for the future development of coastal cities.
highlights: Interaction of Natural and Human Factors
